Organics:
 
Organics stirred, and came online, though she was still in the CR chamber.  The repairs were not close to completion.  She had no idea how long she was in there, but wante to talk.  She opened a comm channel and spoke softly.
"Nightlight, Rodimus, anyone?  Can any hear me?  Is Malice back?  Is anyone there?"

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Nightlight (Sedna):

Nightlight(Sedna) sat around and medited her situation, soon Kenzo 
or Rodimus would tell Maximal who was controling Nightlight's body 
and that isn't good. She had to lef the place and search the others 
Guardians...

She stood up and walked towards the exit.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Organics:
>  
> Organics fell silent as Nightlight carried her into the base and 
to the CR chamber.  As she went offline, her thoughts drifted to 
many things.
>  
> 'The X project.'
> /What?/
> 'The X project is working, soon, he will arive.'
> /Who is going to arrive? Where?  Here?/
> 'Soon...'
>  
> 
> airly2000 <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Rodimus/Windlord/BlackFang/Blacknightmare/DarkFate/Hydras:
> 
> 
> Rodimus was knoked out and fellm. Windlord and Blackfang saw it 
they 
> ran toward his leader and tried to aid it, after they haved 
checked 
> that all was ok, noticed that Malice was gone and Unicron's 
minion's 
> were gone. 
> 
> Nightlight (Sedna) looked al and decided to took Organics towards 
> the base and left her inside  a CR.
> 
> Hydras looked all thos events and thought that something isn't all 
> right but he decide other thing by now "We should retreat... and 
run 
> our alternative plan... just in case"
>
